statements: SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT traveler_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE traveler_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, expense_description, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT expense_id, expense_description, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE traveler_name = 'Bob' ORDER BY expense_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT traveler_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE traveler_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY expense_amount ASC
SELECT DISTINCT traveler_name FROM expenses WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM expense_date) = 1
SELECT expense_id, traveler_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31'
SELECT traveler_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY traveler_name HAVING total_expenses > 5000
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT traveler_id, category FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT expense_id, amount FROM expenses WHERE traveler_id = 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE category IN ('Hotel', 'Transportation');
SELECT traveler_id, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY traveler_id HAVING total_expenses > 5000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT traveler_id, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY traveler_id;
SELECT traveler_id, category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY traveler_id, category ORDER BY traveler_id, total_amount DESC;
SELECT traveler_id, report_date, total_amount FROM travel_expense_reports WHERE total_amount >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM expenses e JOIN travel_expense_reports t ON e.traveler_id = t.traveler_id WHERE e.amount >= 2000 ORDER BY e.expense_date DESC, t.report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses
SELECT expense_description, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100
SELECT expense_date, category FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food'
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_email FROM travelers
SELECT report_date, total_amount FROM expense_reports WHERE total_amount < 500
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_email, department FROM travelers WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT expense_description, amount, category FROM expenses WHERE category IN ('Food', 'Travel') ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_email, department, report_date FROM travelers JOIN expense_reports ON travelers.traveler_id = expense_reports.traveler_id;
SELECT traveler_name, total_amount FROM travelers JOIN expense_reports ON travelers.traveler_id = expense_reports.traveler_id WHERE total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000
SELECT traveler_name, expense_amount FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC
SELECT category_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM categories JOIN expense_details ON categories.category_id = expense_details.category_id GROUP BY category_name
SELECT traveler_name, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses JOIN expense_reports ON expenses.expense_id = expense_reports.traveler_id WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15'

SELECT expenses.expense_id, categories.category_name FROM expenses JOIN expense_details ON expenses.expense_id = expense_details.expense_id JOIN categories ON expense_details.category_id = categories.category_id
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_id = 1
SELECT traveler_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_date = '2022-01-15'

SELECT traveler_name, category_name, expense_amount FROM expenses JOIN expense_details ON expenses.expense_id = expense_details.expense_id JOIN categories ON expense_details.category_id = categories.category_id
SELECT traveler_name, total_expenses FROM travelers JOIN expense_reports ON travelers.traveler_id = expense_reports.traveler_id WHERE travelers.traveler_email = 'john.doe@example.com'

SELECT category_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expense_details JOIN categories ON expense_details.category_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_expenses > 1000
SELECT * FROM expenses
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_department FROM travelers
SELECT report_name, report_date, traveler_name FROM reports JOIN travelers ON reports.traveler_id = travelers.traveler_id

SELECT expense_description, category_name FROM expenses JOIN expense_categories ON expenses.expense_id = expense_categories.expense_id JOIN categories ON expense_categories.category_id = categories.category_id LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM expenses
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM expenses
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_email, traveler_department FROM travelers
SELECT report_name, report_date, traveler_name FROM reports JOIN travelers ON reports.traveler_id = travelers.traveler_id

SELECT expense_description, category_name FROM expenses JOIN expense_categories ON expenses.expense_id = expense_categories.expense_id JOIN categories ON expense_categories.category_id = categories.category_id
